test.label: Simple test

"Hello there, this is
the first test !"
"Hello there, this is the \"second, only the second,\" test !"
"Hello there, this is the \"second, only the second,\"" || " test !"
"Hello there, this is the " || "third" || " test !"
substr(x,y,z) || a || x || substr(x1,y1,z1) || b <> 'abc'
test.expression: Expression using special java regex characters : $, $$ and \$ and quote : "hello \"World\""
